restaurantDescription: Halifax Amager is a restaurant located in Amager, Copenhagen, Denmark. It has a relaxed atmosphere and is known for its flavorful burgers. The restaurant features modern and stylish decor with industrial details. They offer a wide selection of juicy burgers with various types of meat, including beef, chicken, and vegetarian options.
weddingDescription: Helsingør Town Hall Saturday 29th July 2023 at 11:00am
title: You're invited to our wedding!
subtitle: There is nothing that would make us happier than sharing this moment of love and joy with you. Your presence is an invaluable gift and will make this special day even more memorable. Even for those who cannot be physically present, a live stream will be available five minutes before the ceremony at the link above. Join us in this celebration of love and commitment.
inviteCerimony: Please join us for our wedding ceremony.
inviteReception: Join us in celebrating our wedding!
subtitleReception: After the wedding ceremony in Helsingør, we will be continuing the celebration at a restaurant in Copenhagen, surrounded by our closest friends. Your presence would mean the world to us as we commemorate this special day filled with love and joy.

store.buttonGift: I want to give the brides a gift!
